entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is talking to Harry Potter. He says that he would believe Harry to be a wizard who does not seek personal gain.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story. Griphook believes him to be a wizard who does not seek personal gain.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Griphook.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wand-maker who is next door to where Harry is talking with Griphook.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: A group of magical beings that are being discussed by Harry and Griphook.

entities.name: elves
entities.description: A group of magical beings mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Griphook.

relationships.description: Griphook believes that Harry Potter is a wizard who does not seek personal gain.
Wizards refuse to share the secrets of wandlore with goblins.
Goblins are denied the possibility of extending their powers by wizards.
Harry Potter wants to question Ollivander next door.
